name: Dead Quiet (Loui Studios)
description:
Made as part of a 48 hour game jam at Bournemouth University, the player pilots a space ship in first person to destroy the alien mothership before time runs out.

We were under incredible pressure for just a 3 man team, but managed to win one of the awards.

Source code available on GitHub: https://github.com/loui1024/DeadQuiet

Credits:

Code - Loui Eriksson and Finley Goddard

Sound Effects, Art, and Level Design - Loui Eriksson

Soundtrack - Ashley Carter

Ashley's Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/Thrillseyker

Disclaimer:

If you suffer from photosensitive epilepsy or are unsure, please consult a medical professional before playing this game. This product contains bright lights, patterns, and effects that may cause discomfort and / or seizures for those with photosensive conditions. Discretion is advised.
